channel.title: Precision on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Precision on Home

item.title: Laser cutting
item.description: Laser Genius+ 2040 6kW, PRIMA POWER, (Fiber technology) Laser Genius+ is combined with the new fiber laser head, new electronics and innovative mounting for the optics and centering system, guarantee a maximum level of precision and cutting quality. Parameters Value Axis strokes X: 4 320 mm, Y: 2 200 mm, Z: 150 mm Laser power 6 000 W (max. thickness of standard steel, stainless steel and aluminium is 25 mm) Maximum piece weight 2000kg Positioning accuracy and repeatability X, Y: 0,03 mm Speed 130/min (trajectory 180m/min) Acceleration 2,8 g

item.title: Stainless steel products
item.description: One of the three pillars of our production is focused on welding stainless steel. Our dedicated workshop enables us to weld smaller, lighter weldments compared to the production of containers or trailers. Here, we have experience in manufacturing food industry structures, pipes, tanks, and various other welded components. In this field, we have also encountered heat-resistant stainless steels.

item.title: Other products
item.description: Explore the gallery of our other products. In the gallery, you will find countless products, using individual technologies and their combinations. We offer single sheet metal parts, bent sheet metal parts, weldments, machined parts, assembled units. We also are capable to weld aluminium parts.

item.title: Machining
item.description: In the context of our manufacturing operations a milling machine and a lathe offer support. These tools empower us to adapt flexibly to the requirements of our primary welding production. Milling machine Microcut VMCA 1000 CNC Parameters Value Traverses: X: 1 000 mm, Y: 500 mm, Z: 500 mm Table: 1520 x 520 mm Spindle speed: 10 000 rpm Turning machine SA 48/1000 CNC Parameters Value Max. swing diameter, without bed bridge: 710 mm Swing diameter over bed: 475 mm Max.

item.title: Our products
item.description: Our products are designed with precision, durability, and functionality in mind. We offer a wide range of custom-engineered solutions tailored to meet the specific needs of our clients. With a focus on quality and innovation, we ensure that every product meets the highest industry standards. Serving various industries, including oil and gas, automotive, clean tech, agriculture, and more, our diverse portfolio demonstrates our ability to adapt to different sector requirements.

item.title: Technology
item.description: Our company utilizes advanced technologies to ensure precision, efficiency, and innovation in every project. From cutting-edge machining to state-of-the-art fabrication processes, our expertise allows us to deliver high-quality, custom-engineered solutions that meet the most demanding requirements.
